messages: i'm releasing v1.61.0 for the 0.4.0 league early
it includes general guide tweaks, an a4 restructure, and many new 'optionals'
most of these optionals are league rewards, which aren't fully confirmed but very likely
these changes will only be applied after a !guide reset!
there may be another update before launch, depending on whether pob gets an update
as with every league-start patch: if features don't activate correctly, you'll have to recalibrate their screen-checks
